text: Miriam Iris Carey (August 12, 1979 - October 13, 2013) was a dental hygienist. == Early life and education == Carey was born in New York. In 2007, she earned a degree in health nutrition science from Brooklyn College. ==Death== Carey was shot five times after being chased by United States' Secret Service for hitting a U.S. Secret Service officer while trying to drive on the road through White House where there is a security checkpoint. The shooting was criticised by many mental health advocates as Miriam supposedly suffered from the diseases of schizophrenia and bipolar disorder. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2013 deaths Category:2013 crimes in the United States Category:Deaths by firearm in the United States
title: Miriam Carey
